Package com.irurueta.reactorworkshop.polynomial.domain.services

Class PolynomialParametersValidationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.reactorworkshop.polynomial.domain.services.PolynomialParametersValidationService
  • @Service
public class PolynomialParametersValidationService
extends Object
    Validates polynomial degree of provided input evaluation step tree, along with the depth of the tree and the number of polynomials. Notice that maximum allowed values are configurable, but not refreshable. To modify them, service must be restarted.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int maxDegree
      Maximum allowed degree of provided input polynomials.
      private int maxPolynomialCount
      Maximum allowed number of polynomial trees to evaluate in a single request.
      private int maxPolynomialTreeDepth
      Maximum allowed depth of polynomial evaluation steps tree.

      • validate

        public void validate​(List<EvaluationStep> steps)
        Validates a list of polynomial evaluation steps to check maximum allowed polynomial degree, maximum depth of evaluation tree and maximum number of polynomials.
        Parameters:
        steps - steps to validate.
        Throws:
        InvalidEvaluationStepException - if validation fails.

      • validateStep

        private void validateStep​(EvaluationStep step,
                          int depthLevel)
        Validate a polynomial evaluation step to check maximum allowed polynomial degree, and maximum depth of evaluation tree.
        Parameters:
        step - input evaluation step tree.
        depthLevel - depth level of evaluation tree.
        Throws:
        InvalidEvaluationStepException - if validation fails.
